title: Love on the side (2004) - Lesbian comedy
description:
Eve believes she has no more appeal than the leftovers she clears way in her job as a waitress in a small-time diner. However, for years she has harboured a secret crush for the eye-droppingly handsome local football hero who saddly doesn't even realise she exists.

As if Eve's love-life couldn't get any worse, Linda, a larger than life, blonde bombshell from the city sweeps into town, swooping up all the fellas in her path. As the local guys go crazy for Linda, Eve's plans to bag her football hero go seriously awry.
(promotional text)

Stars: Marla Sokoloff, Barry Watson, Monika Schnarre, Jennifer Tilly

Produced: 2004
Runtime: 83 minutes
Director: Vic Sarin

Keywords: Lesbian, Comedy, Romance
